title: Glasgow
name: Tall Ship
directions: alongside the Riverside Museum, West End, subway: Kelvinhall
hours: Summer (Feb-Oct): 10:00-17:00; Winter (Nov-Jan): 10:00-16:00. Last admission: 30min before closing time
price: Free for individuals; groups of 8 or more people: £2 each, £1 concession
content: The ''Glenlee'' was built in 1896 and is one of only five Clydebuilt sailing ships that remain afloat in the world today, now restored and open to the public.
